D.title: Molang Number
D.description: The minecraft molang definition that results in a float.

format_version.title: 1.8.0 Format Version
format_version.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

minecraft:client_entity.title: Client Entity
minecraft:client_entity.description: The entity description for clientside rendering, animations and models.

description.title: Description
description.description: The entity description for clientside rendering, animations and models.

animations.title: Animations
animations.description: These names are used by the animation controller JSON. Players can reference animations from the vanilla Minecraft Resource Pack or create their own. Custom animations should be in the animation folder at the root of the Resource Pack.

additionalProperties.description: These names are used by the animation controller JSON. Players can reference animations from the vanilla Minecraft Resource Pack or create their own. Custom animations should be in the animation folder at the root of the Resource Pack.
additionalProperties.title: Animation Reference

animation_controllers.description: A reference to an animation controller.
animation_controllers.title: Animation Controllers

geometry.title: Geometry
geometry.description: The reference to defined geometries in `<resource pack>/models/'.

hide_armor.title: Hide Armor
hide_armor.description: Hides or shows the possible armor.

held_item_ignores_lighting.title: Held Item Ignores Lighting
held_item_ignores_lighting.description: This determines if the item held by an entity should render fully lit up (if true), or depending on surrounding lighting.

min_engine_version.description: The minimum engine version to be used.
min_engine_version.title: Minimum Engine Version

particle_effects.description: Keys are required and need to be unique from all other keys in the animation controllers. Players can reference particles from the vanilla Minecraft Resource Pack or create their own. Custom particles should be in the particle folder at the root of the Resource Pack.
particle_effects.title: Particle Effects

particle_emitters.description: A collection of particle emitters definitions.
particle_emitters.title: Particle Emitters

render_controllers.description: Players can reference Render Controllers from the vanilla Minecraft Resource Pack or create their own. Custom Render Controllers should be in the textures folder at the root of the Resource Pack.
render_controllers.title: Render Controllers

additionalProperties.description: A render controller activate on conditional.
additionalProperties.title: Render Controller

scripts.title: Scripts
scripts.description: The place where variables, and animations / controller to be run is specified.

pre_animation.description: Client side scripts that are evaluated immediately before animations are processed.
pre_animation.title: Pre Animation

items.description: Clientside molang variables that are to be evaluated during the animation.
items.title: Pre Animation

scale.description: Scale sets the scale of the mob's geometry.
scale.title: Scale

sound_effects.title: Sound Effects
sound_effects.description: A collection of sound effect definition.

spawn_egg.description: The definition of how the spawn_egg icon looks like.
spawn_egg.title: Spawn Egg

base_color.description: The basic color of the egg.
base_color.title: Base Color

overlay_color.description: The colors of the dots on the egg.
overlay_color.title: Overlay Color

additionalProperties.description: A reference to a texture in the resourcepack.
additionalProperties.title: Texture

textures.description: A collection of references to textures in the resourcepack.
textures.title: Textures

should_update_bones_and_effects_offscree.title: Should Update Bones And Effects Offscreen
should_update_bones_and_effects_offscree.description: Bones and effects will still be updated if the entity is off screen if this expression returns anything other than 0.0.

should_update_effects_offscreen.title: Should Update Effects Offscreen
should_update_effects_offscreen.description: Effects will still be updated if the entity is off screen if this expression or `should_update_bones_and_effects_offscreen` returns anything other than 0.0.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: A list of variables that need certain settings applied to them. Currently, for the client, only `public` is supported.

additionalProperties.title: Variable
additionalProperties.description: If a variable is public, it can be read by other mobs. See the molang `->` operator for details.
